title: (gameplay) can't select chroma skin in teambuilder
body: i select a champion that has a chroma skin for teambuilder and i dont get the option to use one. I can go through the other skins but i can't go through the chromas. I would have to go to a custom match to change it in order to use the chroma i want for the match.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is a known issue and we're working to get this functionality implemented.
Chroma skins are only on the PBE right now.
Thank you for your timely response!
They are adding this in next patch.
